Traits.Name: Automated Targeting
Traits.Content: The sentry turret can detect creatures within a 30-foot radius and can automatically prepare to fire at them.

Traits.Name: Reactive Defense
Traits.Content: The sentry turret gains advantage on saving throws against being targeted by ranged attacks due to its defensive programming.

Actions.Name: Precision Laser Fire
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 8 (1d10 + 3) radiant damage. The turret locks onto a target and unleashes a focused beam of light, accurate and swift.

Actions.Name: Targeting Beam (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The turret creates a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one as the line crackles with energy, overwhelming those caught in its path.

Actions.Name: Suppressive Fire
Actions.Content: The turret unleashes a barrage of projectiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 30 feet away from the turret as the projectiles whiz by, knocking them back with the force of the attack.
